article_title: What happens when countries default? Hint
article_text: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Tuesday approved a new government formed by one of his most trusted allies, who has pledged to push through constitutional reforms that would expand the powers of the presidency.

og.description: What happens when countries default? Hint: It’s not good.
og.title: What happens when countries default? Hint: It’s not good.
